description:
Carmel Christkindlmarkt - Director of Corporate Sponsorships

Carmel Christkindlmarkt, Inc. is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization. The primary mission of the organization

is to create and host an authentic, traditional German Christmas festival - the Carmel Christkindlmarkt.

The festival has taken place for six years (2017-2023, skipping 2020 due to Covid-19), drawing 400,000+

visitors annually from mid-November through Christmas Eve. In 2019, 2021, 2022, and 2023 the Carmel

Christkindlmarkt was voted the #1 Holiday Market in North America according to USAToday’s 10Best

Readers’ Choice poll.

The mission of the Carmel Christkindlmarkt is supported by a small team of year-round

staff and seasonal staff members. Our organization highly values the ability of our team members to

work together, to adapt to changing circumstances, and to cultivate an atmosphere of shared success

when engaging with each other, contract vendors, and guests of the Carmel Christkindlmarkt.

Job title:

Director of Sponsorships

Job type:

Full-Time, W-2

Job description:

The Director of Sponsorships is responsible for identifying and recruiting sponsors for the Market,

scheduling tours of the Market with prospective sponsors, and serves as the main point of contact for

the VIP Soft Open event. This Director shepherds the sponsor relationships throughout the duration of

the Market, including overseeing the delivery of all sponsor commitments. The Director is responsible for

all sponsor follow up, including reporting, recognition and renewals. The Director of Sponsorships

reports to the CEO of the Carmel Christkindlmarkt and works closely with them regarding all sponsor

relationships.

Key responsibilities include creating sponsorship proposals, selling sponsorship opportunities to local

businesses, planning and executing sponsorship activation components, facilitating internal and external

communications, and effectively tracking/measuring sponsorship initiatives.
